duties_responsibilities.duty: Create high-quality end-to-end product designs for onboarding and growth features, empowering sellers and their businesses across web, iOS, and Android.
Identify opportunities for the team based on goals and user behavior and work collaboratively across multiple teams at Square to bring agreement on projects and come up with remarkable solutions.
Participate in user research and testing, as well as identify your point of view of what success means for a given initiative.
Lead design on the Onboarding and Growth team within Appointments, charting the strategy, and roadmap of the team, while also working with peers on Engineering and Product.
Work with a community of designers, researchers, and creatives within the Appointments, Conversations, and Square Go teams as well as the larger Square design community.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Design, UX, Human-Computer Interaction, Human Factors, or related field (Master's preferred)
